```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggpmisc)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
```
```{r}
data(who)

df <- who %>% 
  filter(year >= 1996, year <= 2012) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = new_sp_f014, y = new_sp_m014, color = factor(year))) +
  geom_point(size = 0.4) +
  geom_jitter(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.2, na.rm = TRUE) +
  labs(x = "Casos positivos de ni単as entre 0-14 a単os",
       y = "Casos positivos de ni単os entre 0-14 a単os") +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, formula = y ~ x) +
  stat_poly_eq(formula = y ~ x, aes(label = paste(stat(eq.label), stat(adj.rr.label), sep = "*\", \"*")), 
               parse = TRUE, size = 3, label.x.npc = 0.15, label.y.npc = 0.85, 
               coef.digits = 2) +
  facet_wrap(. ~ year) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
df
```
